channel.title: Mouse Recorder
channel.description: Can anyone make me a mouse recorder like If I click a wf vial and then click the ingredient for herblore, then the mouse recorder will record that, and replay so I can auto-herb

item.title: Mouse Recorder
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Well, I don’t have a SCAR script to record mouse movements (nor do I like the idea of one), but I DO have a program that records your mouse movements and replays them. It altars the speed of the mouse a little, so that might be helpful in anti-ban, but I still don’t recommend it that much.

http://www.mediafire.com/?1no4bjz01ma
Use it at your own risk.

If you want something more efficient (and wont get you banned), I suggest learning the basics of SCAR’s mouse manipulation and writing something with random mouse movements.

Read full topic
